title: PM Gifts Biden A Silver Hand-Engraved Train Model, Jill A Pashmina Shawl
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today gifted an antique silver hand-engraved train model to US President Joe Biden.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today gifted an antique silver hand-engraved train model to US President Joe Biden.

title: Security Council To Space Tech: Key Takeaways From Modi-Biden Meet In US
content: US President Joe Biden commended Prime Minister Narendra Modi for his historic visit to Ukraine and his message of peace amid the war with Russia. The US also backed permanent membership for India in the UN Security Council.
summary: US President Joe Biden commended Prime Minister Narendra Modi for his historic visit to Ukraine and his message of peace amid the war with Russia. The US also backed permanent membership for India in the UN Security Council.

title: Cancer Moonshot To Sea Observer Mission: Key Takeaways From Quad Summit
content: PM Narendra Modi, US President Joe Biden, Japan PM Kishida Fumio, and Australia's Anthony Albanese held the fourth in-person Quad Leaders Summit in Wilmington on Saturday.
summary: PM Narendra Modi, US President Joe Biden, Japan PM Kishida Fumio, and Australia's Anthony Albanese held the fourth in-person Quad Leaders Summit in Wilmington on Saturday.

title: India, US To Elevate Bilateral Ties To Expand Clean Energy Supply Chains
content: The US and India plan to elevate bilateral technical, financial, and policy support to expand complementary manufacturing capacity for building on existing clean energy cooperation between the two nations, according to the White House.
summary: The US and India plan to elevate bilateral technical, financial, and policy support to expand complementary manufacturing capacity for building on existing clean energy cooperation between the two nations, according to the White House.

title: Israel Bombards Lebanon As Hezbollah Launches Rocket Attacks: 10 Facts
content: Hezbollah on Saturday launched a series of rocket attacks from Lebanon into northern Israel, marking one of the most intense cross-border confrontations since the war began in October.
summary: Hezbollah on Saturday launched a series of rocket attacks from Lebanon into northern Israel, marking one of the most intense cross-border confrontations since the war began in October.

title: US Man Arrested In The Murder Of His Father, Stepmother And Stepbrother
content: Brian Crossman Jr., 22, now faces three counts of aggravated murder for the fatal shootings of his father, stepmother, and stepbrother.
summary: Brian Crossman Jr., 22, now faces three counts of aggravated murder for the fatal shootings of his father, stepmother, and stepbrother.

title: US Supports India's Push For Permanent Seat In UN Security Council
content: US President Joe Biden has told Prime Minister Narendra Modi that the United States supports initiatives to reform global institutions to reflect India's important voice, including permanent membership for India in a "reformed" UNSC.
summary: US President Joe Biden has told Prime Minister Narendra Modi that the United States supports initiatives to reform global institutions to reflect India's important voice, including permanent membership for India in a "reformed" UNSC.

title: Sri Lanka's Marxist Politician Anura Dissanayake Leads Presidential Vote
content: Sri Lanka's Marxist-leaning leader, Anura Kumara Dissanayake, grabbed a commanding early lead on Sunday in his bid to become the next president of the debt-ridden country seeking to elect a leader to bolster its fragile economic recovery.
summary: Sri Lanka's Marxist-leaning leader, Anura Kumara Dissanayake, grabbed a commanding early lead on Sunday in his bid to become the next president of the debt-ridden country seeking to elect a leader to bolster its fragile economic recovery.

title: "China Testing Us On Several Fronts": Joe Biden To Quad Leaders
content: US President Joe Biden was caught on a hot mic telling leaders of the Quad nations that China was testing them, thus reflecting upon the American seriousness of the emerging Chinese threat.
summary: US President Joe Biden was caught on a hot mic telling leaders of the Quad nations that China was testing them, thus reflecting upon the American seriousness of the emerging Chinese threat.

title: "Take All Cameras And Leave": Israel Raids Al Jazeera's West Bank Office
content: "Heavily armed and masked Israeli soldiers" entered the building and handed the closure order to Qatari broadcaster's West Bank bureau chief, Al Jazeera reported.
summary: "Heavily armed and masked Israeli soldiers" entered the building and handed the closure order to Qatari broadcaster's West Bank bureau chief, Al Jazeera reported.

title: Watch: Will Quad Survive Beyond Nov? Biden's Gesture. PM Modi By His Side
content: US President Joe Biden, one of the architects of the Quad grouping, was asked ahead of the Quad summit in Delaware if it would survive beyond November elections.
summary: US President Joe Biden, one of the architects of the Quad grouping, was asked ahead of the Quad summit in Delaware if it would survive beyond November elections.

title: As PM Modi And Joe Biden Hold Bilateral Talks, A Mega Drone Deal Firms Up
content: India and the United States today firmed up multi-billion dollar drone deal as PM Modi met Joe Biden on the first day of his three-day visit to the US.
summary: India and the United States today firmed up multi-billion dollar drone deal as PM Modi met Joe Biden on the first day of his three-day visit to the US.

title: "Free, Open Indo-Pacific Is Our Shared Priority": PM Modi At Quad Summit
content: A free, open, and inclusive Indo-Pacific is the shared priority and commitment of the Quad countries, said Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the Quad summit on Saturday.
summary: A free, open, and inclusive Indo-Pacific is the shared priority and commitment of the Quad countries, said Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the Quad summit on Saturday.

title: "Talks Were Extreme Fruitful": PM Modi Meets President Biden In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said his talks with US President Joe Biden ahead of the Quad summit were extremely fruitful. The two leaders discussed regional and global issues during their bilateral meeting held at the US President's Delaware home.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said his talks with US President Joe Biden ahead of the Quad summit were extremely fruitful. The two leaders discussed regional and global issues during their bilateral meeting held at the US President's Delaware home.

title: "Each Time We Sit Down...": Biden Posts Pics Of Meeting PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit. PM Modi was welcomed by Mr Biden at his residence, where the two leaders hugged each other. Mr Biden held PM Modi's hand as he led him into the house.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit. PM Modi was welcomed by Mr Biden at his residence, where the two leaders hugged each other. Mr Biden held PM Modi's hand as he led him into the house.

title: Russia-Ukraine Discussion On Agenda As PM Modi, Joe Biden Hold Talks
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit here and the two leaders were expected to discuss a range of issues, including the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit here and the two leaders were expected to discuss a range of issues, including the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: French President Macron Announces New Government Led By PM Michel Barnier
content: President Emmanuel Macron named a new government led by Prime Minister Michel Barnier Saturday, his office said, marked by a shift to the right 11 weeks after an inconclusive parliamentary election.
summary: President Emmanuel Macron named a new government led by Prime Minister Michel Barnier Saturday, his office said, marked by a shift to the right 11 weeks after an inconclusive parliamentary election.

title: New Zealand Pilot Freed After 19 Months In Rebel Captivity In Indonesia
content: New Zealand pilot Phillip Mehrtens has been released from captivity by rebels in Indonesia's restive Papua region and is in good health despite the 19-month ordeal, Indonesian and New Zealand authorities said Saturday.
summary: New Zealand pilot Phillip Mehrtens has been released from captivity by rebels in Indonesia's restive Papua region and is in good health despite the 19-month ordeal, Indonesian and New Zealand authorities said Saturday.

title: Kamala Harris Challenges Donald Trump To Another Debate Ahead Of Elections
content: Kamala Harris on Saturday challenged Donald Trump to another debate in the lead-up to the US presidential election, with her campaign saying she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to host the event on October 23.
summary: Kamala Harris on Saturday challenged Donald Trump to another debate in the lead-up to the US presidential election, with her campaign saying she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to host the event on October 23.
